name: book-recommendations
description: Book Recommendations is an SPA that allows users to enter/update book recommendations. The app will organize the listing of recommendations based on the data in the events and user choices.

scripts.client: cd src/client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: node src/app-server.js & cd src/client && npm start

author: Harsha Vykunta <vykunta.h@husky.neu.edu>
